overview:
## Discussion

For possible values, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPageViewController/SpineLocation-swift.enum]. A spine location is only valid if the transition style is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPageViewController/TransitionStyle-swift.enum/pageCurl].

If the transition style is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPageViewController/TransitionStyle-swift.enum/pageCurl], the default value for this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPageViewController/SpineLocation-swift.enum/min]; otherwise, the default is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPageViewController/SpineLocation-swift.enum/none].

# spineLocation

**Type Property**

Location of the spine.

## Declaration

```swift
static let spineLocation: UIPageViewController.OptionsKey
```

## Discussion

For possible values, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPageViewController/SpineLocation-swift.enum]. A spine location is only valid if the transition style is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPageViewController/TransitionStyle-swift.enum/pageCurl].

If the transition style is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPageViewController/TransitionStyle-swift.enum/pageCurl], the default value for this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPageViewController/SpineLocation-swift.enum/min]; otherwise, the default is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPageViewController/SpineLocation-swift.enum/none].

## Page options

- **interPageSpacing**: Space between pages, in points.
